named-query.name: rol.all
named-query.query: select distinct o from Rol o left join fetch o.rolPermiso

named-query.name: configuracion.all
named-query.query: select o from Configuracion o Where o.institucion.insId = ?1

named-query.name: permiso.get.source.list
named-query.query: select o from Permiso o where o.perId not in (select o.permiso.perId from RolPermiso o where o.rol.rolId = ?1)

named-query.name: permiso.get.target.list
named-query.query: select o from Permiso o where o.perId in (select o.permiso.perId from RolPermiso o where o.rol.rolId = ?1)

named-query.name: rolpermisos.get.permisos.rol
named-query.query: select o from RolPermiso o where o.rol.rolId = ?1

named-query.name: rolpermisos.delete
named-query.query: select o from RolPermiso o where o.rol.rolId = ?1 and o.permiso.perId = ?2
